blogPost.excerpt: Share your websites, products, social pages, and more, all in one link with Bio Sites from Unfold. You have more than one link, your bio should too. Available in Unfold on iOS and Android.
blogPost.body: Share your websites, products, social pages, and more, all in one link with Bio Sites from Unfold. You have more than one link, your bio should too. Available in Unfold on iOS and Android.
blogPost.title: Bio Sites by Unfold - Share your links. Connect with your audience.
blogPost.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: 通过Unfold的Bio网站以一个链接分享您的网站、产品、社交页面等。你有多个链接，你的简历也应该有。可在iOS和Android的Unfold中使用。
localize.tagline: 分享您的链接。与您的观众联系。

localize.description: 通過Unfold的Bio網站以一個鏈接分享您的網站、產品、社交頁面等。你有多個鏈接，你的簡歷也應該有。可在iOS和Android的Unfold中使用。
localize.tagline: 分享您的鏈接。與您的觀衆聯繫。

previous.excerpt: Trend brainstorms, deep dives into different ecosystem (including case studies and gaps in the market analyses), expert interviews, and niche market data to help founders and investors spot opportunities.
previous.title: Opportunities.so - Deep dives, trend brainstorms, and niche data for founders

localize.description: 趋势头脑风暴，深度挖掘不同的生态系统（包括案例分析和市场分析中的差距），专家访谈和利基市场数据，帮助创始人和投资者发现机会。
localize.tagline: 为创始人提供深度挖掘、趋势头脑风暴和利基数据。

localize.description: 趨勢頭腦風暴，深度挖掘不同的生態系統（包括案例分析和市場分析中的差距），專家訪談和利基市場數據，幫助創始人和投資者發現機會。
localize.tagline: 爲創始人提供深度挖掘、趨勢頭腦風暴和利基數據。

next.excerpt: Idenati is designed to simplify your experience, to organize everything you do online in one place, allowing you to focus and be more productive.
next.title: Idenati - Organize everything you do online in one place

localize.description: Idenati的设计是为了简化您的体验，将您在网上做的所有事情组织在一个地方，让您集中精力，提高工作效率。
localize.tagline: 在一个地方组织您的所有在线活动

localize.description: Idenati的設計是爲了簡化您的體驗，將您在網上做的所有事情組織在一個地方，讓您集中精力，提高工作效率。
